sprintGoal: Build Jobs Module foundation with job posting, company profiles, and candidate profiles

tasks.title: Implement job posting backend API
tasks.description: Create job posting system with LLM-specific metadata and comprehensive fields
acceptanceCriteria: jobs table with all required fields from spec
POST /api/jobs creates job posting (company accounts only)
GET /api/jobs returns paginated job listings with filters
Job status: draft, active, closed, filled
Required fields: title, description, requirements, experience_level, employment_type, location, positions_count
Optional fields: salary_min, salary_max, deadline, benefits, screening_questions
LLM metadata: models_used, frameworks, vector_dbs, cloud_platforms, languages, use_case_type, model_strategy
Automatic status change to closed on deadline
Search and filter by all metadata fields

technicalNotes.tables: jobs (id, company_id, title, description, requirements, experience_level, employment_type, location, remote_type, salary_min, salary_max, deadline, status), job_metadata (job_id, models_used, frameworks, etc.), job_skills (job_id, skill_name, skill_level)
technicalNotes.enums: experience_level (junior, mid, senior, lead), employment_type (full_time, part_time, freelance, internship), remote_type (remote, hybrid, on_site)

tasks.title: Build job posting creation form
tasks.description: Create comprehensive job posting form with all LLM-specific fields
acceptanceCriteria: Multi-step form: Basic Info → Requirements → Tech Stack → Details
Step 1: title, description (rich text), employment type, positions
Step 2: experience level, requirements, required skills (with star rating)
Step 3: LLM models (multi-select), frameworks, vector DBs, cloud platforms, languages
Step 4: location, remote type, salary range, deadline, benefits, screening questions

tasks.title: Build job listings and detail pages
tasks.description: Create job browsing interface with filters and detailed job pages
acceptanceCriteria: Job cards show: title, company, location, salary, remote type, key tech stack
Filters sidebar: location, remote, salary range, experience level, employment type, models, frameworks, has_visa_sponsorship
Pagination (20 per page) or infinite scroll
Detail shows: full description, requirements, tech stack overview, skills with levels, use case, benefits, interview process, company info

technicalNotes.seo: Dynamic meta tags, JSON-LD structured data for job postings

tasks.title: Implement company profiles backend
tasks.description: Create company profile system with branding, info, and job management
acceptanceCriteria: companies table with comprehensive profile fields
Company fields: name, slug, logo, header_image, description, mission, team_size, founded, locations, website, benefits, culture_description
Tech stack fields: models_used, frameworks, tech_stack

technicalNotes.table: companies (id, user_id, name, slug, logo_url, header_image_url, description, mission, team_size, founded, website, verified)
technicalNotes.slug: Auto-generate from company name, ensure uniqueness

tasks.title: Build company profile pages
tasks.description: Create public company profiles with jobs, info, and culture
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section: logo, header image, company name, verified badge
About section: description, mission, team size, founded, locations
Active jobs section (grid of job cards)
Settings: edit all profile fields, upload logo/header

technicalNotes.upload: Image upload for logo (max 2MB) and header (max 5MB)

tasks.title: Implement candidate profiles backend
tasks.description: Create candidate profile system with work experience, skills, portfolio, and job preferences
acceptanceCriteria: work_experiences table: job_title, company, period, description
education table: degree, institution, field, period
portfolio_projects table: title, description, tech_stack, links, screenshots
job_preferences table: roles_interested, company_preferences, location, remote, salary_expectations, availability
Privacy settings per section (public, community, recruiters, private)
Community stats included (forum reputation, badges, top answers)
tasks.completionNotes: Candidate profiles backend implementation completed. Created JobPreferences table, profiles module with validation/repository/service/controller layers, and three API endpoints. Reused existing user tables (WorkExperience, Education, PortfolioProject, UserSkill). Implemented privacy controls per section, recruiter visibility, and community stats integration. Comprehensive tests and API documentation included. Migration pending due to network issues - run 'npx prisma migrate dev' to apply schema changes.

technicalNotes.tables: job_preferences (new), work_experiences (existing), education (existing), portfolio_projects (existing), user_skills (existing), profile_privacy_settings (existing)
technicalNotes.privacy: Enum: public, community, recruiters, private per section

tasks.title: Build candidate profile pages and forms
tasks.description: Create comprehensive candidate profile interface with edit forms
acceptanceCriteria: Header: photo, name, headline, location, availability status
LLM Experience section: models worked with (proficiency stars), skills, frameworks, programming languages
Portfolio section (max 5 featured projects with screenshots)
Community Stats: forum reputation, badges, top answers, tutorials published
Job Preferences section (if looking for work)

technicalNotes.components: CandidateProfile, ProfileHeader, WorkExperience, Portfolio, SkillsGrid, ProfileEditor

tasks.title: Test jobs module foundation
tasks.description: Test job posting, company profiles, and candidate profiles
acceptanceCriteria: Job posting form submits successfully with all fields
Job draft saves and restores correctly
Job listings display with accurate filters
Job detail pages show all information
Work experience, education, portfolio CRUD works
tasks.completionNotes: PARTIAL COMPLETION: Code review and static analysis completed for tasks 7-001 to 7-005. Comprehensive QA report generated. Issues found: backend tests need fixing, frontend unit tests missing, E2E testing not performed. Candidate profile testing (7-006, 7-007) skipped due to Sprint 1 dependency. Runtime testing pending.

scenarios: Create job posting with full details
Complete candidate profile with all sections

deliverables: Job posting system with LLM metadata
notes: Sprint 7 establishes the Jobs Module foundation. Focus on making job postings rich with LLM-specific metadata - this is the platform's differentiator. Candidate profiles should showcase both technical skills and community contributions.
risks: Job posting form complexity may overwhelm users - consider progressive disclosure
Candidate profile may be too detailed - ensure optional fields are clearly marked
Privacy settings complexity needs clear UX
